name: Barbecued Beef Sandwiches
author: Poni
summary: This recipe came from a military wife almost 30 years ago (thanks Elise) and it couldn't be much easier. Simply combine all ingredients and cook for 3 hours, then shred the meat. Serve it on buns of your choice...and then sit back and take in the compliments! Everyone loves this recipe, and I've used it at fund raising events with great success! Excellent with potato salad or coleslaw.
ingredients: 1 (28 ounce) can diced tomatoes with juice
⅓ (10 fluid ounce) bottle Worcestershire sauce
directions: Place roast in a Dutch oven, and sprinkle with chopped onions
Cover with tomatoes, water, sugar and Worcestershire sauce
Cook over medium heat with lid slightly ajar for 3 hours
Remove meat, and shred with 2 forks
place shredded meat back into sauce, and cook until liquid is reduced, 15 to 20 minutes
